description: A 900FP down jacket with lightweight construction for when weight and pack size are critical to success. Built with an ultralight 10D Pertex® Quantum outer and zoned stitch-through baffles for mobility, it’s ideal for fast moving alpinists.
name: Rab Mythic Alpine Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% Recycled Polyamide - 10D Recycled Pertex® Quantum nylon ripstop (28 g
